Condor:

Condor didn't wake up. He was in stasis lock while Switchblade dra=
gs him towards the lab. When reprogramation process started his maximal pro=
gram started to fight to avoid it.


----- Original Message ----- 
  From: =
rAuq 
  To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
  Sent: Monday, April 23, 2001 12:17 AM=

  Subject: Re: Reprograming / Fireblade


  ::Switchblade::

        As Fi=
reblade arrives Switchblade comes out of his dreaming, 
  "Fireblade hand m=
e the sword when you're done with it, I've got 
  some time while the repro=
gramation process works it's magic." He 
  hands his energon welder to Fire=
blade.


  On 23 Apr 2001, at 5:13, gunthers8@... wrote:

  > ::Fi=
reBlade::
  > FireBlade complies without answering knowing that SwitchBlade=
 will 
  > not want interruptions. He walks to the lab and begins his own w=
ork 
  > of crafting his blade. 
  > "I just need you to do the final circu=
ty" he sias
  > 
  > --- In nbwrpg@y..., "rAuq" <rauq@t...> wrote:
  > > ::=
Switchblade::
  > >       Switchblade puts Condor onto his makeshift table.=
 He draws 
  > > out his laser pistol, and presses a button on the side. Th=
e 
  > pistol's 
  > > handle folds into its body, and its end extends a bi=
t. A bright 
  > white 
  > > light comes out of the end about one inch lon=
g. Switchblade 
  > > clamps Condor's arms, legs, and torso to the table. H=
e pulls a 
  > > machine over to Condor's head, attaches electrodes and suc=
h to 
  > > the sides of Condor's temples and begins reprograming the bot. =

  > > Then he recieves the comm from Fireblade. 
  > >       "Fireblade, I=
 am in my lab right now, you can come down here. 
  > > The reprograming of=
 Condor has begun," the commlink closes, and 
  > > he laughs to himself, r=
ubbing his hands together.
